# Active Dashboards (SY22-23)

<br>

<a href="https://youtu.be/mRBWfdjEv-4">End of Session Dashboard Tutorial</a>  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://youtu.be/dxE-PciN-ZY">Facilitator Facing Dashboard Tutorial</a>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="https://youtu.be/KZsLENMy8cg">End of Course Dashboard Tutorial</a>

```{r active-dashboards, echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)

report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c("Facilitator facing dashboards",
               "Coaching facing dashboards",
               "Internal End of Session Dashboard",
               "Internal End of Course Dashboard",
               "Ongoing Coaching Dashboard",
               "End of Coaching Dashboard",
               "Educator Survey Dashboard",
               "Knowledge Assessments Dashboards",
               "IPG Dashboard",
               "Student Survey Dashboard",
               "Chicago Consultancy Feedback Dashboard"),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Dashboards/FacilitatorFacingDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/CoachingFacingDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsSession.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsCourse.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsOngoingCoaching.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsEndCoaching.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsDiagnosticDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsKnowledgeAssessment.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsIPGDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/BlankDashboard.png"),
                here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsConsultancyDashboard.png")),
  link = c("https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/FacilitatorAuth/",
           "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/CoachingAuth/",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/62cf1818b2bfe20010b73370",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/62f3cbf2bcc32c0010a7db88?pageId=Page_a4a3fb0e-2d6a-402c-9008-b299c554fd57",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/6317cbd1f9feca001046524d?pageId=Page_f76e2092-a99b-480c-a9dd-2c4bb5becaee",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/6318d897a3a583000f1518ba?pageId=Page_0998ca6d-2c3c-463e-baed-f5dc6fd22289",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/63053d35379f890010cc456e?pageId=Page_fcc6840b-679e-4652-b50c-6a95853b5887",
           "22_23_knowledge_assessments.html",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/630500d0663413001002f3e9?pageId=Page_bfe4b4d1-74a3-4b24-8a1c-5a90e65ef172",
           "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/Q/MyProjectsSection",
           "#")
)

report_galleries |>
  cards(
    title = "",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "inset-bottom",
    spacing = 3
  )
```

# Visualizations

<br>

```{r visualizations, echo = F}
time_diff <- Sys.Date() - as.Date("2019-01-01")
year_diff <- round(as.numeric(time_diff)/365)
galleries3 <- tibble::tibble(
  long_name = c("Visualizing and textualizing TL data.",
                "How much does each US state spend per kid per capita over time?"),
  blurb = c(paste0("A visualization of ", year_diff, " years of reviews of Teaching Lab courses by type of content."),
            ""),
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Visualizations/Reviews.png"),
                here::here("Images/Visualizations/SpendingperKid.png")),
  link = c("https://teachinglab.github.io/TLReviews.html",
           "https://teachinglab.github.io/USStateSpendingperKid.html")
)

galleries3 |>
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    layout = "label-below", 
    width = 2,
    spacing = 3
  )
```
